Class AccountUtil

      • createEntry

        public static OrderLine createEntry(OrderLine e,
                    DataConnection dc)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Creates an orderline. If the account is of type personal, a complementary orderline is also created. As a precaution, orderlines are marked not transfered.
        Parameters:
        e - the order to save
        dc - data connection
        Returns:
        a new payment order line
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • isPersonalAccount

        public static boolean isPersonalAccount(Account c)
        Specifies if the account c is a personal account. Personal account begins by digit PERSONAL_ACCOUNT_FIRST_DIGIT.
        Parameters:
        c - account
        Returns:
        true if personal account
